titleStmt.title: The marryed mans lesson: or, A disswasion from iealousie. To the tune of, All you that will wooe a wench.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: For Iohn Wright, the younger, dwelling at the signe of the Sunne, at the lower end of Snow-hill, neere unto Holborne Conduit.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You men who are marri'd come hearken to mee ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sunne, at the lower end of Snow-hill, neere unto Holborne Conduit.
